### Information

<h3>Background</h3>

This application is designed to provide insights around Major League Baseball. It leverages data from the [Lahman R package](https://cran.r-project.org/package=Lahman). Special thanks to [Sean Lahman](http://seanlahman.com/) for creating such an amazing baseball database and making it open-source!

<h3>Getting Started</h3>

The [Home](#home) page provides final league standings by year.
